description:
Rei Kigata is a boy, a first year middle schooler at Ishido Middle School. He is not a believer of any paranormal phenomenon such as existence of ghosts or spirits in any kind, but one day at midnight, while he is in sleep, a mysterious newspaper called “Horror News” is delivered to his room.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pages in White (The World of Spirits) This mysterious newspaper is delivered at midnight! Part 1
